00028 typedef enum {
00029    DEV_ADC = 0,
00030    DEV_AVR_EEPROM,
00031    DEV_AVR_RSSI,
00032    DEV_AVR_I2C,
00033    DEV_MICA2_LIGHT,

00035    DEV_MICA2_MIC,

00045    DEV_MSP_HUMIDITY,
00046    DEV_TELOS_FLASH,
00047    NUM_DEVICES
00048 } dev_id_t;

00069 typedef uint16_t (*dev_read_func_t)(void *buf, uint16_t count);
00070 typedef uint16_t (*dev_write_func_t)(const void *buf, uint16_t count);
00071 typedef uint8_t (*dev_mode_func_t)(uint8_t md);
00072 typedef uint8_t (*dev_ioctl_func_t)(int8_t request, ...);
00073 
00074 extern mos_mutex_t adc_mutex;
00075 uint16_t dev_read_DEV_ADC(void *buf, uint16_t count);
00076 uint16_t dev_write_DEV_ADC(const void *buf, uint16_t count);
00077 uint8_t dev_mode_DEV_ADC(uint8_t md);
00078 uint8_t dev_ioctl_DEV_ADC(int8_t request, ...);
00079 #define dev_open_DEV_ADC() mos_mutex_lock(&adc_mutex)
00080 #define dev_close_DEV_ADC() mos_mutex_unlock(&adc_mutex)

00214 uint8_t dev_write_DEV_MSP_TEMPERATURE(const void *buf, uint16_t count);
00215 #define dev_mode_DEV_MSP_TEMPERTURE(newMode)   dev_mode_DEV_MSP_HUMIDITY(newMode)
00216 #define dev_ioctl_DEV_MSP_TEMPERATURE(request) dev_ioctl_DEV_MSP_HUMIDITY(request)
00217 #define dev_open_DEV_MSP_TEMPERATURE(void) mos_mutex_lock(&msp_temp_mutex)
00218 #define dev_close_DEV_MSP_TEMPERATURE(void) mos_mutex_unlock(&msp_temp_mutex)

00233 #define dev_read(dev,buf,count) dev_read_##dev(buf, count)
00234 
00237 #define dev_write(dev,buf,count) dev_write_##dev(buf, count)
00238 
00241 #define dev_mode(dev,mode) dev_mode_##dev(mode)
00242 
00246 #define dev_ioctl(dev,request,args...) dev_ioctl_##dev(request, ##args)
00247 
00248 #define dev_open(dev) dev_open_##dev()
00249 #define dev_close(dev) dev_close_##dev()
00250 
00251 /*mode definitions*/
00253 #define DEV_MODE_OFF     0 
00254 
00255 #define DEV_MODE_IDLE    1 
00256 
00257 #define DEV_MODE_ON      2 
00258 
00259 /*some ioctl definitions*/
00261 #define DEV_SEEK 1
00262 #define DEV_FLUSH 2
00263 #define DEV_LOCK 3
00264 #define DEV_UNLOCK 4
00265 
00266 #define DEV_OK 0
00267 #define DEV_UNSUPPORTED -1
00268 #define DEV_NOT_REGISTERED -2
00269 #define DEV_OUT_OF_RANGE -3
00270 #define DEV_BAD_IOCTL -4
00271 #define DEV_BAD_MODE -5
00272 
00273 #endif
